data.dataAccessDetails: Users must complete Captcha puzzle in order to search

description.en: Businesses and NGOs in Uganda register with the Registration Services Bureau and receive an identification number. This number can be used as an identifier. A publicly available database can be searched on the Bureau website.

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds:
Users can search organisations by name to find their identifier on the bureau website: https://brs.ursb.go.ug/brs/pro/bnr/searchname 

Users must complete a Captcha puzzle in order to search. The identifiers will be under the column header 'Nr'.

Users should be aware that identifiers are not formed in a uniform manner, and use slashes and hyphens.
